original_text: They carried his body to Canaan. They buried him there in the cave, in the field at Machpelah, near Mamre. That is the cave that Abraham had bought from Ephron the Hittite. He had bought it as a grave for him and for his family.
korean_text: 그를 가나안 땅으로 메어다가 마므레 앞 막벨라 밭 굴에 장사하였으니 이는 아브라함이 헷 족속 에브론에게 밭과 함께 사서 매장지를 삼은 곳이더라

sentences.original_text: They carried his body to Canaan.
They buried him there in the cave,
that Abraham had bought from Ephron the Hittite.
sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함이 헷 족속 에브론에게서 산 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He had bought it as a grave for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 그를 위한 무덤으로 샀고
